page.title: 11SHOPPING SURVEY IN BALLATER
page.content: Most of the people that we asked during our survey were people who lived locally.The people that didn't live locally came from a number of towns and cities throughout Britain e.g. Glasgow and London. We asked the ones that did live here how many times a week they shopped in the Mace food shop; most of them shopped every day. A lot of the people that we asked were over 50 and unable to do their shopping in Aberdeen (40 miles away), but the others could drive in more often. The people that didn't live here were visitors; most had been here before and were staying more than 2 weeks. We asked everyone if they thought that there were enough shops in Ballater, most of them did. Most of the people were female and over 50 years of age.
